project_id.description: The GCP project ID for the project containing the target BigQuery dataset. Required for authentication and billing. When syncing from multiple projects, also configure the project_ids field.
project_id.title: Project ID

project_ids.description: Optional list of GCP project IDs to pull data from. If set, the connector will read from all listed projects. When this field is present, the project_id field is used as the default/billing project for authentication.
project_ids.title: Project IDs

dataset_id.description: The dataset ID to search for tables and views. If you are only loading data from one dataset, setting this option could result in much faster schema discovery.
dataset_id.title: Default Dataset ID

credentials_json.description: The contents of your Service Account Key JSON file. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
credentials_json.title: Credentials JSON
